page.title: 18MOTOR-CYCLING.A RACE VISIT.
page.content: My favourite sport is motor-cycling and my favourite riders are Randy Mamola,Eddie Lawson and Freddie Spencer. Last year I went to the British Grand Prix.During one race there was a bad crash and 2 riders came off their bikes at 100mph.All the people with cameras rushed to take photos whilst the other riders were still going round the track at about 150 mph. The race organisers didn't stop the race until 3 laps later.The race was delayed for about thirty minutes while the track was cleared.Sadly both riders were killed in the crash. I watched two other good races;one with 250 cc bikes and one with 350 cc bikes competing.
